'Hrmmm...'%K%P
Kagura sat in front of her PC\ngrumbling at something.%K%P
It had been a while since she'd started\npolishing her dance skills, but the results weren't\nexactly what we'd been hoping for.%K%P
'Are my dance moves and my boobs really my\nonly good points?'%K%P
'I feel like I've only reinforced the idea that\nI'm some kind of dumb bimbo.'%K%P
Her shoulders trembled a little\nas she spoke.\nI could practically hear her grinding her teeth.%K%P
'Hey! What gives, Yamato?!'%K%P
'This is making me even less popular than before!'%K%P
'Just calm down, okay?'%K%P
'How can you expect me to be calm?!'%K%P
Kagura snapped back at me.%K%P
We'd both been working so hard the last few days.\nI could understand her frustration.%K%P
'Humans are naturally cautious about\nanything new.'%K%P
'Just give them some time\nand I'm sure they'll realize how awesome\nyour new routine is.'%K%P
'Hmm, you really think so?'%K%P
'Trust me, you'll be even more popular than before.'%K%P
'Let's hope so... It'd be nice if everyone was\na little less fixated on breasts, too...'%K%P
Kagura moved the mouse, scrolling through the\ncomments written about herself.%K%P
'What's wrong?'%K%P
'...Look.'%K%P
'Hm?'%K%P
On the monitor was a new page\nthat Kagura had found.%K%P
I glanced at the content.%K%P
'What's this...?\n'Kagura only passed the preliminaries\nbecause she teamed up with Shuri.''%K%P
''Now that she's on her own\nyou can see what level her own skills are at.''%K%P
''In the end, Kagura was just bonus content.''%K%P
Everyone in this thread seemed to love Shuri,\nbut had nothing but contempt for Kagura.%K%P
When you're in the public eye,\nnot everyone is going to like you.%K%P
There will always be people who dislike your work,\nthat's just how it goes.%K%P
'...So I was just a bonus that came with Shuri?'%K%P
'What are you talking about?\nYou know that's not true.'%K%P
'But I could never have passed the preliminaries\non my own.'%K%P
'Sure, but neither could Shuri.\nYou both passed because\nyour strengths complemented each other.%K%P
'You really think so...?'%K%P
'I know so.'%K%P
'But it looks like Shuri's so much more\npopular than me...'%K%P
Kagura brought up another page to demonstrate.%K%P
Even on news sites,\nstories about Shuri were a lot more common.%K%P
'I guess they're right. Shuri was the real star,\nI was just an added bonus...'%K%P
'What's wrong? This isn't like you.'%K%P
Kagura was looking more downhearted,\nso I tried to give her a pep talk.%K%P
'Isn't it? What is 'like me', then?'%K%P
'Well, you're usually so positive and\nfull of energy.'%K%P
'But it sounds like that's exactly why\nso many people don't like me...'%K%P
'Kagura, get a hold of yourself.\nSure it's important to have a good online following,\nbut it's not everything.'%K%P
'If you let yourself get this depressed over\na few nasty comments, it's not going to get easier.'%K%P
'Yeah, I know that but...'%K%P
'And you're definitely not just an add-on for Shuri.\nThat much, I can guarantee.'%K%P
'You have a charm that's all your own.\nIt's only a matter of time until everyone realizes.'%K%P
'Yamato...'%K%P
I looked Kagura right in the eyes as I spoke.\nAnd I had meant every single word.%K%P
'You'd never have passed the preliminaries if\nyou were nothing more than a bonus, right?'%K%P
'You know that\nfar better than anyone.'%K%P
'...Yeah, you're right, Yamato. Thanks.'%K%P
Kagura finally smiled up at me.%K%P
But it was a fragile smile,\nthat somehow looked like it was forced.%K%P
'Kagura, are you really okay?'%K%P
'Yeah, I'm fine now! Sorry to get you all worried.'%K%P
'Okay, let's get back to training.\nPractice, practice, practice!\nI've gotta work harder than ever to beat Shuri.'%K%P
'Now that sounds more like the Kagura I know.'%K%P
It looked like she was finally back to her old self,\nand I was relieved.%K%P
But it wouldn't be long before I realized\nhow wrong I was.%K%P
She may be a goddess, but underneath it all\nKagura was still a regular girl...%K%P
I shouldn't have allowed myself to forget that.%K%P
